analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#72-73) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#85-91)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#99-105)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#111-117)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#123-128)

KratosToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#825-830) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timelockTimestamp > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#829)

KratosToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#830-838) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timelockTimestamp > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#837-838)

KratosToken.enableTimelock (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#800-805) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(timelockTimestamp == 0 || _timelockTimestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#802-804)

KratosToken._addTimelock (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#815-819) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_timestamp > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#816-817)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#1160-1171) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#1165-1167)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#1177-1182) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol#1180-1182)

KratosFinalsale.setClosingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_closingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0x2f2c79834729efe9d0a15190adf198bddf71efa1.sol)
